thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Helicopter Pilot Cites Passenger Bag as Possible Cause of Crash

author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Helicopter Pilot Cites Passenger Bag as Possible Cause of Crash
text:
The pilot of a helicopter that crashed into New York City’s East River Sunday night said one of the passenger’s bags may have inadvertently hit the emergency fuel-shutoff button, leading to the crash that killed five passengers, a person familiar with the investigation said.
Before the crash, the pilot and lone survivor phoned a mayday call to air-traffic control saying the engine failed, according to an audio recording of the call.
...
